title: The 12 Gays of Christmas (Crossover)
description:
On this episode, Joe rings in the holiday season by sharing a podcast he was recently featured on called the "12 Gays of Christmas" with Bryan Moylan. Joe talks about his favorite "christmas" movie, Gremlins!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
